description.None: Add 1 of {{Amount}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=6BFFCD>Dizzy?</c> cards to hand.
description.A: Add 1 of {{Amount}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=6BFFCD>Dizzy?</c> cards to hand.
description.B: Add 1 of {{Amount}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=6BFFCD>Dizzy?</c> cards to hand. <c=keyword>Then do it again</c>.

CorrosionShotStarter.name: Corrosive Fuelshot
CorrosionShotStarter.description: ATK: {{Damage}} dmg & <c=boldPink>{{Amount}}</c> <c=status>corrode</c>. Gain <c=boldPink>{{Amount}}</c> <c=status>heat</c>. Add a <c=card>Toxic</c> to deck.

description.None:
Gain <c=boldPink>{{Amount}}</c> <c=status>shield</c>.
Add a <c=card>Slime Heal </c> to your draw pile.
description.A:
Gain <c=boldPink>{{Amount}}</c> <c=status>shield</c>.
Add a <c=card>Slime Heal A</c> to your draw pile.
description.B:
Gain <c=boldPink>{{Amount}}</c> <c=status>shield</c>.
Add a <c=card>Slime Heal B</c> to your draw pile.

description.A:
<c=healing>Heal 1</c>.
Draw the top card in your <c=boldPink>draw pile</c> and play it.
description.B:
<c=healing>Heal 1</c>.
From your <c=boldPink>discard</c>, draw a card and play it.

description.None: Enemy gains <c=boldPink>{{Amount}}</c> <c=status>corrode</c>. +1 for every second time ever played. {{Count}}
description.A: Enemy gains <c=boldPink>{{Amount}}</c> <c=status>corrode</c>. +1 for every second time ever played. {{Count}}

description.None: Put a <c=card>Slime Mutation</c> in your <c=boldPink>discard pile</c>. Draw <c=boldPink>1</c>.
description.A: Put a <c=card>Slime Mutation</c> in your <c=boldPink>discard pile</c>. Draw <c=boldPink>1</c>.
description.B: Put a <c=card>Slime Mutation</c> in your <c=boldPink>draw pile</c>. Draw <c=boldPink>1</c>.

SlimeMutation.name: Slime Mutation
SlimeMutation.description: Put a <c=card>SLIME BLAST!!</c> in your discard pile.

SlimeBLAST.name: Slime BLAST!!
SlimeBLAST.description:
Attack.
Dmg = Double of all your statuses.{{Amount}}

description.None: Attack for <c=boldPink>{{Damage}}</c> damage. Add <c=boldPink>{{Count}}</c> <c=card>Fumes</c> to your <c=boldPink>draw pile</c>.
description.A: Attack for <c=boldPink>{{Damage}}</c> damage. Add <c=boldPink>{{Count}}</c> <c=card>Fumes</c> to your <c=boldPink>discard pile</c>.
description.B: Attack for <c=boldPink>{{Damage}}</c> damage. Add <c=boldPink>{{Count}}</c> <c=card>Fumes</c> to your <c=boldPink>draw pile</c>.

HeatHoarder.name: HeatHoarder
HeatHoarder.description: Gain <c=boldPink>{{Amount}}</c> <c=status>Heat Control</c>. Add {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>non-temp</c> <c=card>Miasma</c> to your draw pile.

description.None:
Gain {{Amount}} <c=status>shield</c>.
Add a <c=card>Temp Shield Replica</c> to your draw pile.
description.A:
Gain {{Amount}} <c=status>shield</c>.
Add a <c=card>Temp Shield Replica A</c> to your draw pile.
description.B:
Gain {{Amount}} <c=status>shield</c>.
Add a <c=card>Temp Shield Replica B</c> to your draw pile.

description.None:
Gain {{Amount}} <c=status>temp shield</c>.
Add a <c=card>Shield Replica</c> to your hand.
description.A:
Gain {{Amount}} <c=status>temp shield</c>.
Add a <c=card>Shield Replica A</c> to your hand.
description.B:
Gain {{Amount}} <c=status>temp shield</c>.
Add a <c=card>Shield Replica B</c> to your hand.

description.A: Turn <c=redd>ALL</c> <c=status>corrode</c> into <c=status>heat</c>. Gain a <c=card>Corrosion Ignition A</c>.
description.B: Turn <c=redd>ALL</c> <c=status>heat</c> into <c=status>corrode</c>. Gain a <c=card>Corrosion Ignition B</c>.

FlameShot.name: Flame Shot
FlameShot.description: Attack for <c=boldPink>{{Damage}}</c> damage. Add <c=boldPink>{{Count}}</c> <c=card>Miasma</c> to your draw pile.

A3.name: START
A3.description: Gain a special artifact and lose <c=status>KONAMI CODE</c>.

UnstableTanks.name: UNSTABLE TANKS
UnstableTanks.description: At the start of battle, add a <c=card>Leaking Container</c> to hand. <c=downside>Gain 2 oxidation each turn</c>.

OverdriveTanks.name: OVERDRIVE TANKS
OverdriveTanks.description: Replaces <c=artifact>UNSTABLE FUELTANKS</c>. Gain 1 <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn. At the start of battle, gain a <c=card>Leaking Container</c>. <c=downside>Gain 2 oxidation each turn</c>.

FuelWalls.name: FUEL WALLS
FuelWalls.description:
(Corrosive Cobra-exclusive artifact!)
On pickup, add 3 <c=card>Adv. Heat Protection</c> to your deck.

SlimeHeart.name: SLIME HEART
SlimeHeart.description: Gain 1 <c=status>EVOLVE</c> at the start of your first turn of combat.

ToxicCaviar.name: TOXIC CAVIAR
ToxicCaviar.description: Lose 1 <c=status>CORRODE</c> each turn. <c=healing>If you do</c>, the enemy gains <c=boldPink>2</c>.

PowerAcid.name: POWERACID
PowerAcid.description: <c=downside>Draw 1 less card per turn</c>. At the end of your turn, the enemy triggers <c=status>CORRODE</c>.

Dissolvent.name: DISSOLVENT
Dissolvent.description: Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn. <c=downside>The first time each turn you are dealt damage, you receive an extra 2 damage</c>.

SlimeBooksArtifact.name: CRYSTAL TAP
SlimeBooksArtifact.description: At the start of your turn, if you don't have a <c=card>Crystal Tap</c> in your hand, gain one.

SlimeCatArtifact.name: TIME WACK
SlimeCatArtifact.description: The first time you end your turn with only 1 hull, gain 1 <c=status>PERFECT SHIELD</c> and the enemy gains 1 <c=status>CORRODE</c>. <c=downside>Only triggers once per combat</c>.

SlimeDizzyArtifact.name: UNYIELDING ROOK
SlimeDizzyArtifact.description: Gain <c=keyword>+1 max shield</c>. Whenever you lose hull, if you have, either, 5 or more <c=status>OXIDATION</c>, or 1 or more <c=status>CORRODE</c>, gain 2 <c=status>SHIELD</c>.

SlimeDrakeArtifact.name: KITCHENWARE
SlimeDrakeArtifact.description: Whenever you gain heat while <c=downside>overheating</c>, fire for 1 <c=status>CORRODE</c>.

SlimeIsaacArtifact.name: COBRA FIELD
SlimeIsaacArtifact.description: At the start of combat, add a <c=card>Cobra Field</c> to your hand. On the fifth turn of combat, gain 5 <c=status>DRONESHIFT</c>.

SlimeMaxArtifact.name: KONAMI CODE
SlimeMaxArtifact.description: At the start of combat, add an <c=card>UP Button</c> to your hand. <c=keyword>Play the last card of the sequence to gain a special artifact</c> <c=downside>and remove this one</c>.

SlimeMaxArtifactReward.name: CHEAT SHEET
SlimeMaxArtifactReward.description: At the start of combat, add a <c=card>Cheat Sheet</c> to your hand.

SlimePeriArtifact.name: UP-TO-DATE PROTOCOL
SlimePeriArtifact.description: <c=downside>Draw 1 less card per turn</c>. At the start of combat, gain 1 <c=status>POWERDRIVE</c>.

SlimeRiggsArtifact.name: CHEESE TEA
SlimeRiggsArtifact.description: Every time your discard pile is shuffled back into your draw pile, add a <c=card>Cheese Tea</c> to <c=keyword>your draw pile</c>.

SlimeSogginsArtifact.name: TOAD GYM
SlimeSogginsArtifact.description:
The forth time Soggins botches a card, gain a <c=card>Toad in a Treadmill</c>.
The forth time Soggins doubles a card, gain a <c=card>Toad with a Gun</c>.
<c=downside>Reset this any time Soggins botches or doubles out of sequence</c>.

cobra.name: Corrosive Cobra
cobra.description: A derelict from another timeline, the Cobra specializes in corrosion attacks. Beware the fuel leaks.

slime.name: Dizzy?
description: A friend from another timeline. His cards play with <c=keyword>heat and corrode</c>, for better, or <c=hurt>worse</c>.

EvolveStatus.name: Evolve
EvolveStatus.description: Whenever you draw a <c=trash>Trash</c> card, draw <c=boldPink>{0}</c>.

HeatOutbreakStatus.name: Heat Outbreak
HeatOutbreakStatus.description: At the end of turn, this ship is dealt <c=boldPink>{0}</c> damage per <c=status>heat</c> it has.

HeatControlStatus.name: Heat Control
HeatControlStatus.description: At the end of turn, your overheat trigger increases by 1 <c=healing>permanently</c>, <c=downside>then decrease this by 1</c>.

CrystalTapStatus.name: Crystal Tap
CrystalTapStatus.description: The next card is played twice.

OxidationStatus.name: Oxidation
OxidationStatus.description: If oxidation is <c=boldPink>7</c> or more at end of turn, gain 1 <c=status>CORRODE</c> and set oxidation to 0.

PlayRandomCardHand.name: Bypass Hand
PlayRandomCardHand.description: Play a random card in hand, at no <c=energy>energy</c> cost.

PlayRandomCardDeck.name: Bypass Draw
PlayRandomCardDeck.description: Draw a card, then play it, at no <c=energy>energy</c> cost.

PlayRandomCardDiscard.name: Bypass Discard
PlayRandomCardDiscard.description: Draw a random card from the discard pile, then play it, at no <c=energy>energy</c> cost.

PlayRandomCardExhaust.name: Bypass Exhaust
PlayRandomCardExhaust.description: Draw a random card from the exhaust pile, then play it, at no <c=energy>energy</c> cost.

CobraField.name: Cobra Field
CobraField.description: Instantly turn every <c=midrow>object in the midrow</c> into <c=drone>Corrode missiles</c> aimed at the enemy.
